name: Survival Island Pro
description:
How Many Days can u Survive Alone in a paradise island full of Wild Animals? You the Hero of the game was met a storm in the open sea, while travelling with a team of explorers and the only survivor. Stay Alive as long as you can and remember to use resources wisely as its limited in content. Once the Project is Complete it will be available only for purchasing. If You like our game and want us to develop it further please help us by donating or sharing the game link in social profiles . Please Don't Forget to rate us and commenting in the comment section

Upcoming updates:

-Better UI

-Zombies and pirates

-New Weapons

-Leader Board

-Game will be improved depending on the feedbacks from first players

-Bug Fixes and Developments in the island

-Dialogue Systems
